channel.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince
channel.description:
#### What happened?
As sellsword, I stonewalled prince since I knew the king was evil. He claimed to OEd Prince but he says it was prevented.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Stonewall allows attackers. The OE should have gone through.
#### Steps to reproduce:
As sellsword stonewall somebody and let King OE stonewalled person.
#### Comments:
Why ?

item.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince
item.dc:creator: sunbird
item.description:
@Insanity
Because it prevents healers and defenders, while allowing NK or Assassin to attack the target.

Read full topic
item.source: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince

item.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
It is indeed, a bug.

Since OE is supposed to count as attack.

And wait, why did you stonewalled Prince when you’re sellsword?

Read full topic
item.source: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince

item.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.source: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince

item.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Guys it does not count as a visit as in

Observer can’t see it

However it can still be prevented

I am guessing that it does not count as an attacking ability

Read full topic
item.source: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince

item.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince
item.dc:creator: sunbird
item.description:
If OE does not count as visit it shouldnt be prevented in first place because stonewall stops visitors ?

Read full topic
item.source: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince

item.title: King OE Prevented on Stonewalled Prince

item.description:
Could possibly be because OE doesn’t count as a visit?
